content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 1, 2016 Locky Adds New File Format and Attacks UK September 1, 2016 Cyren caught a new Locky email spam campaign today which uses a new tactic, delivering the Locky downloader script component as an HTML application, specifically HTA files. The emails are disguised as voice message notifications sent by Peach Telecom, which suggests that the campaign is targeting users in the UK.
